name: Co-power Venture Capital
overview: Founded in 2008, Shenzhen Co-Power Venture Capital Co., Ltd. (Co-Power VC) is a branch company within the Co-Power family, specifically set up for venture investment with private equity and corporate financing services. It is established by the Co-Power Capital core team and other investment management professionals, integrated from domestic and international capital experts and other business sources. The registered capital is 40 million yuan. Co-Power VC pursues offering high quality and professional financing services to invested enterprises by providing new business model, capital operation, and corporate value growth, helping the invested enterprises to become leaders in their respective industries and longing for growing with these invested enterprises

funding_round.source_description: Herun Media Receives Second-round of Investment from Co-Power VC

company.name: Beijing Herun Detang Media and Advertising
